dcterms:creator: M. Schlemminger
T. Ohrdes
E. Schneider
M. Knoop
dcterms:description: An aggregated residential electrical load profiles dataset measured in 38 single-family houses in Northern Germany, consisting of active and reactive power per household from 10 seconds to 60 minute temporal resolution dated from May 2018 to December of 2020.
dcterms:title: Aggregated residential electrical load profiles
